p.strong:
9 National Merit Semi-Finalists
Over 40 AP Course Offerings and Dual Enrollment Opportunities
$40 million in scholarships for the Class of 2019

strong.span: Nationally recognized, award-winning Band, Orchestra, Choir, Theater and Visual Arts programs

br.span: Film and Video program focused on student production in a professional TV studio on campus
Over 250 students selected in All-West performance groups in 2019
Nationally recognized Cheer and Pom squads
19 consecutive years named Best of the Preps by the Commercial Appeal
Recreational and competitive sports available at every school
Multi-cultural festivals, Days of Diversity, and Internationally focused clubs and activities
Several family focused events create an inclusive community for newcomers
District-wide focus on providing students with community service opportunities across grade levels
